}, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset(); // console.log(hiremeData) // setHiremeData({ name:"", email:"",phone:"",message:""}) } return ( HiðŸ‘‹, I'm Sanchay Sethi { typewriter .pauseFor(600) .typeString("Full Stack Developer") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("Web Developer") .pauseFor(600) .deleteChars(9) .typeString("Designer") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("App Developer") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("UI/UX Designer") .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString("Freelancer") .pauseFor(2000) .start();
